name: Player Laboratory Alpha
description:
the dev of dark birthday

dev is 13 years old

made with unity

This is a prototype/alpha version game. so, 
the completeness is much lower or the play time is shorter.

Congratulations! You got a job at this laboratory! You were looking around the lab, and you got on an unstable elevator, and it crashed! You've come down to the underground of this lab, and you have to get out of here!
